welcome.title: Staff Guide Introduction
welcome.p1: Your duty as a staff member is to ensure that all users have the utmost experience possible. If you do have any questions, even in the slightest, feel free to ask for an opinion. Answers may also be found in the F.A.Q. section of this website.
welcome.p2: Please keep in mind that what you do on other servers/social media platforms further influences your staff position on the network. Breaking any staff rules on any platform will put your position at risk.
welcome.warning: Management have full access to modify anything mentioned in this website. If anything is altered, you will be notified via staff chat. If you have any suggestions for the staff website, please contact Rio.

guidelines.title: Staff Guidelines
guidelines.intro: As a staff member, you are required to maintain professionalism and adhere to the guidelines. Treat all players with kindness and respect, regardless of whether they are a fellow staff member, a friend, or someone you don't get along with.
guidelines.warning: All punishments are made at the discretion of staff management.

conduct: Be polite and respectful to all players
integrity: Treat all players equally, regardless of relationships or personal opinions
Avoid favoritism, bias, or any form of unfair treatment
confidentiality: Do not disclose private staff discussions or sensitive information
Protect the privacy of players and staff
responsiveness: Respond to player questions, reports, and concerns promptly
Stay active and available during your assigned duties
conflict: Refrain from engaging in drama or conflicts with players or staff
Report any issues or disputes to higher staff if necessary
familiarity: Know and understand the server's rules and staff guidelines
Stay updated with any changes to rules or procedures
appearance: Avoid using offensive or unprofessional usernames, nicknames, or profile pictures
Represent the server with pride and professionalism at all times
power: Do not use your staff permissions for personal gain or to harass others
Avoid actions that may appear as favoritism or abuse

footer.confidentialInfo: All information contained in this guide is strictly confidential and for staff eyes only.
footer.leakWarning: Sharing this information will result in immediate demotion.
